name: GMail - Remove ads and relocate action links (alt)
description:
This style removes the ad panel from Gmail or Google Apps Mail, relocates the action links (Print all, new window, etc.) from the side bar to above the message area, and widens the mail content area.

****** DEPRECATED ******
This is not working anymore after the update that brought the "People" widget in the right side column.
It may be replaced by style 50996.
additional_info:

History :
Version 0.1 - 2008-11-27
- Initial Version - based on version 0.3 of style 11768.

Version 0.2 - 2008-11-27
- Redesigned the action links so that they look like buttons. This allows the links to be readable even with themes with a dark background. And it looks way better, too.

Version 0.3 - 2009-01-23
- Fix the ad area when the browser window is narrow (thanks pihentagy)

Version 0.4 - 2009-02-04
- The buttons in GMail now have a skin applied to them. The action links are now styled to look like them (including mouse interaction effects).

Version 0.5 - 2009-02-17
- The buttons are now in the right order (first one on the left).
- (Kind of) fixed the border for the "Turn on highlighting" button.
- Fixed the action links in the "New windows".

Version 0.6 - 2009-02-25
- Integrate with the latest GMail updates

Version 0.7 - 2009-03-04
- Integrate with the latest GMail updates (again)
- Handle the notifications nicely

Version 0.8 - 2009-07-07
- Integrate with the latest GMail updates

Version 0.9 - 2009-12-22
- Fix for Google Chrome
Note : if you have a suggestion or want to report a bug, start a discussion, so that I can answer you...

Version 0.10 - 2010-07-13
- Fix content width when "show details" is selected (thanks to Henrique Abreu)

Version 0.11 - 2011-05-12
- Integrate with the latest GMail updates (the links were no longer visible)
